name: weird_platform_game_boy.gb
description:
I found this very weird platform game on my hard drive the other day. Looks like it's an old Game Boy rom.  I didn't really had time to make a game for the Nordic Game Jam 2022 (double booked my vacation this weekend, lol silly me) Instead, I just recompiled this rom into a Unity project and uploaded it. Maybe you can figure out who this very egocentric person is?

Rumor has it, that the first who figure it out will get an ice cream!
